text: Balkundra is a census town in Patratu (community development block) of Ramgarh district in the state of Jharkhand, India. ==Demographics== India census, Balkundra had a population of 5,369. Males constitute 54% of the population and females 46%. Balkundra has an average literacy rate of 68%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 61% of the males and 39% of females literate. 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. As per 2011 Census of India Balkundra had a population of 3,915. There were 2,136 males and 1,779 females. Scheduled Castes numbered 225 and Scheduled Tribes numbered 1,847. ==Literacy== As per 2011 census the total number of literates in Balkundra was 2,533 out of which 1,542 were males and 991 were females. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Ramgarh district
title: Balkundra
